**Special launch price for a limited time only $2.99/ month or $26.99/ year**

If you loved Any.do before, you won’t believe the improvements we made in 3.0!
What's new:

[+] Complete design update and navigation overhaul  
[+] List Sharing is finally here!
[+] Two brand new list filters (Date, Priority or original List)
[+] Rich, bold new themes to fully customize your Any.do experience 
[+] Custom default list - choose exactly what list you want as your default
[+] Learn everything you need to know in a 5 second on-boarding experience

If you like what you see, show us some love with a 5 star rating on the AppStore <3

此版本中的新功能：
●爱Any.do？ 与你的朋友分享！
●现在支持Siri快捷方式 - Sweeeeet！
你有没有尝试我们的新智能购物清单？
●它通过过道对您的物品进行分类（是的，真的！）
●允许您为不同的商店创建多个列表
●自动检测杂货物品;
●可以轻松与任何人共享您的购物清单
●可以轻松添加到您的购物清单！
●与Siri和Alexa无缝协作。
顺便说一句，应用程序商店评论对我们非常有帮助。
如果你发现任何。 我们非常感激。
谢谢！

跟你的新共享购物清单打招呼：
●它通过过道对您的物品进行分类（是的，真的！）
●您可以为不同的商店创建多个列表
●它可以自动检测杂货物品，并允许您轻松将它们移动到正确的列表中
●您可以与任何人共享您的购物清单
●将在线配方成分复制到剪贴板中，该列表可帮助您自动导入和排序

此外：
●分享您的清单和分配任务的新方式（非常适合情侣，家庭和团队）
●网格视图中列表的新设计
●升级的提醒体验（比以往更简单）
●使用拖放升级的子任务

New in this version:
● Siri Shortcuts support!
● Fully competible with iOS 12
● We fixed the Location Reminder bug
● We fixed the Apple Watch bug
● We fixed the Grocery List bug
Say hello to your new shared grocery list:
● It sorts your items by aisles (yes, really!)
● You can create multiple lists for different stores
● It auto-detects grocery items and allows you to easily move them to the right list
● You can share your grocery lists with anyone
● Copy online recipe ingredients into your clipboard and the list would help you import and sort them automatically
In addition:
● NEW way to share your lists & assign tasks (perfect for couples, families and teams)
● NEW design for your lists in grid view
● Upgraded reminders experience (Simpler than ever)
● Upgraded sub-tasks with Drag & Drop
